mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees ( EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, HIRE_DATE, JOB_ID, SALARY, COMMISSION_PCT, MANAGER_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID ) values ( seq_emp.nextval, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, sysdate, #{jobId}, #{salary}, #{commissionPct}, #{managerId}, #{departmentId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET FIRST_NAME = #{firstName}, LAST_NAME = #{lastName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber}, SALARY = #{salary}, COMMISSION_PCT = #{commissionPct} WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
mapper.select: SELECT e.EMPLOYEE_ID, e.FIRST_NAME, e.LAST_NAME, e.EMAIL, e.PHONE_NUMBER, e.HIRE_DATE, e.JOB_ID, e.SALARY, e.COMMISSION_PCT, m.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || m.LAST_NAME as MANAGER_ID, d.DEPARTMENT_NAME as DEPARTMENT_ID FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employees m ON e.MANAGER_ID = m.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.DEPARTMENT_ID = d.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE e.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
